1113  GX::SetZMode(GX_FALSE, GX_ALWAYS, GX_FALSE);
1114 // D3DXMATRIX stored_view_matrix = EngineGlobals.view_matrix;
1115 // D3DXMATRIX stored_projection_matrix = EngineGlobals.projection_matrix;
1116 
1117  // Goes through the list of render target textures, rendering to each one in turn.
1118  pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->IterateStart();
1119  sTextureProjectionDetails *p_details = pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->IterateNext();
1120 //
1121 // // Set the basic pixel shader that just copies a single color (in C0) over.
1122 // EngineGlobals.pixel_shader_constants[0] = 1.0f;

1139 // cam.end();
1140 
1141  while( p_details )
1142  {
1143  if( p_details->p_model )
1144  {
1145  // Set the new render target.
1147 //
1148 // D3DDevice_Clear( 0, 0, D3DCLEAR_TARGET, 0, 1.0f, 0 );
1149 
1150  // Set the view and projection transforms.
1151 // EngineGlobals.view_matrix = p_details->view_matrix;
1152 // EngineGlobals.projection_matrix = p_details->projection_matrix;
1153 // EngineGlobals.is_orthographic = true;
1154 
1155  // Render all instances for the CGeom's contained in this model.
1156  int num_geoms = p_details->p_model->GetNumGeoms();
1157  for( int i = 0; i < num_geoms; ++i )
1158  {
1159  Nx::CNgcGeom *p_ngc_geom = static_cast<Nx::CNgcGeom*>( p_details->p_model->GetGeomByIndex( i ));
1160  CInstance *p_instance = p_ngc_geom->GetInstance();
1161 
1162  if( p_instance->GetActive())
1163  {
1164  // Create the camera and attach a frame.
1165  NsCamera cam;
1166  //NsFrame frame;
1167  //cam.setFrame( &frame );
1168 
1169  // Assume parallel projection in this case.
1170  cam.orthographic();
1171  cam.orthographic( 0, 0, 256, 256 );
1172  cam.setViewWindow( 128, 128 );
1173 
1174  // Position the camera somewhere near the object, pointing directly at it.
1175  float at[3];
1176  float pos[3];
1177 
1178  at[0] = p_instance->GetTransform()->GetPos()[X];
1179  at[1] = p_instance->GetTransform()->GetPos()[Y];
1180  at[2] = p_instance->GetTransform()->GetPos()[Z];
1181 
1182  pos[0] = p_instance->GetTransform()->GetPos()[X];
1183  pos[1] = p_instance->GetTransform()->GetPos()[Y] + 64.0f;
1184  pos[2] = p_instance->GetTransform()->GetPos()[Z];
1185 
1186  g_shadow_object_pos = p_instance->GetTransform()->GetPos();
1187  g_shadow_object_pos[Y] += ( 12.0f * 3.0f ); // Amount of leeway...
1188 
1189  // Also need to take account of the view offset.
1190  Mth::Vector object_up = p_instance->GetTransform()->GetUp();
1191  at[0] += object_up.GetX() * 36.0f;
1192  at[1] += object_up.GetY() * 36.0f;
1193  at[2] += object_up.GetZ() * 36.0f;
1194  pos[0] += object_up.GetX() * 36.0f;
1195  pos[1] += object_up.GetY() * 36.0f;
1196  pos[2] += object_up.GetZ() * 36.0f;
1197 
1198  cam.pos( pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] );
1199  cam.up( 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
1200  cam.lookAt( at[0], at[1], at[2] );
1201 
1202 // EngineGlobals.world_to_camera.identity();
1203 // EngineGlobals.world_to_camera.setPos( pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] );
1204 // EngineGlobals.world_to_camera.setRight( 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
1205 // EngineGlobals.world_to_camera.setUp( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
1206 // EngineGlobals.world_to_camera.setAt( 0.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f );
1207 
1208  cam.begin();
1209  MTXCopy ( (MtxPtr)cam.getCurrent(), EngineGlobals.current_uploaded );
1210 
1211  EngineGlobals.world_to_camera.copy( *cam.getCurrent() );
1212  EngineGlobals.shadow_camera.copy( *cam.getCurrent() );
1213 
1214  // Flag the scene as having the shadow version rendered.
1215  p_instance->GetScene()->m_flags |= SCENE_FLAG_RENDERING_SHADOW;
1216 
1217  // Render the model.
1218 // ROMtx bone_mtx[60];
1219 // p_instance->Transform( vRENDER_SHADOW_1ST_PASS, bone_mtx, NULL );
1220 // p_instance->ClearFlag( NxNgc::CInstance::INSTANCE_FLAG_TRANSFORM_ME );
1221  p_instance->Render( vRENDER_SHADOW_1ST_PASS );
1222 
1223  // Clear the flag the scene as having the shadow version rendered.
1224  p_instance->GetScene()->m_flags &= ~SCENE_FLAG_RENDERING_SHADOW;
1225 
1226  // Flag the scene as self shadowing.
1227  p_instance->GetScene()->m_flags |= SCENE_FLAG_SELF_SHADOWS;
1228  }
1229  }
1230  }
1231  p_details = pTextureProjectionDetailsTable->IterateNext();
1232  }
1233 //
1234 // // Pixel shader override no longer required.
1235 // EngineGlobals.pixel_shader_override = 0;
1236 //
1237 // // Restore the view and projection transforms.
1238 // EngineGlobals.view_matrix = stored_view_matrix;
1239 // EngineGlobals.projection_matrix = stored_projection_matrix;
1240 // EngineGlobals.is_orthographic = false;
1241 //
1242 // // Restore the world transform.
1243 // D3DDevice_SetTransform( D3DTS_WORLD, &EngineGlobals.world_matrix );
1244 //
1245 // // Restore the default render target.

1247 }

◆ figure_wibble_vc()

void NxNgc::figure_wibble_vc ( sScene *  p_scene)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 1260

1261 {
1262  if ( !p_scene->mp_scene_data ) return;
1263 
1264  // The vertex color wibble flag is placed in pass 0.
1265  NxNgc::sMaterialVCWibbleKeyHeader * p_key_header = p_scene->mp_vc_wibble;
1266  NxNgc::sMaterialVCWibbleKey * p_key = (NxNgc::sMaterialVCWibbleKey *)&p_key_header[1];
1267 
1268  int current_time = (int)Tmr::GetTime();
1269 
1270  uint32 * p_col = p_scene->mp_col_pool;
1271 
1272  for ( int wibble = 0; wibble < p_scene->mp_scene_data->m_num_vc_wibbles; wibble++ )
1273  {
1274  int num_keys = p_key_header->m_num_frames;
1275  int phase_shift = p_key_header->m_phase;
1276 
1277  // Time parameters.
1278  int start_time = p_key[0].m_time;
1279  int end_time = p_key[(num_keys - 1)].m_time;
1280  int period = end_time - start_time;
1281  int time = start_time + (( current_time + phase_shift ) % period );
1282 
1283  // Locate the keyframe.
1284  int key;
1285  for( key = num_keys - 1; key >= 0; --key )
1286  {
1287  if( time >= p_key[key].m_time )
1288  {
1289  break;
1290  }
1291  }
1292 
1293  // Parameter expressing how far we are between between this keyframe and the next.
1294  float t = (float)( time - p_key[key].m_time ) / (float)( p_key[key+1].m_time - p_key[key].m_time );
1295 
1296  // Interpolate the color.
1297  GXColor rgba;
1298  rgba.r = (uint8)((( 1.0f - t ) * p_key[key].m_color.r ) + ( t * p_key[key + 1].m_color.r ));
1299  rgba.g = (uint8)((( 1.0f - t ) * p_key[key].m_color.g ) + ( t * p_key[key + 1].m_color.g ));
1300  rgba.b = (uint8)((( 1.0f - t ) * p_key[key].m_color.b ) + ( t * p_key[key + 1].m_color.b ));
1301  rgba.a = (uint8)((( 1.0f - t ) * p_key[key].m_color.a ) + ( t * p_key[key + 1].m_color.a ));
1302 
1303  p_col[wibble] = *((uint32*)&rgba);
1304 
1305  // Next wibble sequence.
1306  p_key_header = (NxNgc::sMaterialVCWibbleKeyHeader *)&p_key[num_keys];
1307  p_key = (NxNgc::sMaterialVCWibbleKey *)&p_key_header[1];
1308  }
1309 }

Перекрестные ссылки Tmr::GetTime(), NxNgc::sMaterialVCWibbleKey::m_color, NxNgc::sMaterialVCWibbleKeyHeader::m_num_frames, NxNgc::sSceneHeader::m_num_vc_wibbles, NxNgc::sMaterialVCWibbleKeyHeader::m_phase, NxNgc::sMaterialVCWibbleKey::m_time, NxNgc::sScene::mp_col_pool, NxNgc::sScene::mp_scene_data и NxNgc::sScene::mp_vc_wibble.

Используется в render_scene().

Используется в render_scene().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

2047  // Dynamic meshes.
2048  sSortedMeshEntry sortedMeshArray[1000];
2049  int next_sorted_mesh_entry = 0;
2050 
2051  for ( int mesh = presemi; mesh < dynsemi; mesh++ )
2052  {
2053  sMesh * p_mesh = p_scene->mpp_mesh_list[mesh];
2054

2059  sortedMeshArray[next_sorted_mesh_entry].sort = frustum_sort_mid( p_mesh->mp_dl->m_sphere );
2060  ++next_sorted_mesh_entry;
2061  }
2062  }
2063  qsort( sortedMeshArray, next_sorted_mesh_entry, sizeof( sSortedMeshEntry ), cmp );
2064 
2065  _reset();
2066  for( int m = 0; m < next_sorted_mesh_entry; ++m )
2067  {
2068  submit_mesh( p_scene, sortedMeshArray[m].p_mesh, p_posNormBuffer, p_bone_xform, p_instance_xform, &array_base, &col_base, &layer, pm, &base_color, &set_chan, &world_fog, flags );
2069  }

2072  _reset();

2129  GX::SetAlphaCompare(GX_ALWAYS, 0, GX_AOP_AND, GX_ALWAYS, 0 );
2130 // GX::SetBlendMode ( GX_BM_NONE, GX_BL_ONE, GX_BL_ONE, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE ); // Replace
2131  GX::SetBlendMode( GX_BM_BLEND, GX_BL_DSTCLR, GX_BL_ZERO, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
2132  GX::SetCurrMtxPosTex03( GX_PNMTX0, GX_TEXMTX7, GX_TEXMTX7, GX_TEXMTX7, GX_TEXMTX7 );
2133 
2134  GX::SetTevOrder(GX_TEVSTAGE0, GX_TEXCOORD0, GX_TEXMAP0, GX_COLOR_NULL, GX_TEXCOORD0, GX_TEXMAP_NULL, GX_COLOR_NULL);
2135  GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( GX_TEVSTAGE0, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO,
2136  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_DISABLE, GX_TEVPREV,
2137  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
2138  GX::SetTevColorInOp( GX_TEVSTAGE0, GX_CC_ONE, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_TEXC, GX_CC_ZERO,
2139  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_DISABLE, GX_TEVPREV );
2140 
2141 
2142 //out_reg = (d (op) ((1.0 - c)*a + c*b) + bias) * scale;
2143 
2144  GX::SetVtxDesc( 2, GX_VA_POS, GX_DIRECT, GX_VA_TEX0, GX_DIRECT );
2145 
2146 // visible_mesh_array[visible_mesh_array_index++] = p_scene->m_semitransparent_meshes[e];
2147 // for ( int mesh = 0; mesh < p_scene->m_num_filled_meshes; mesh++ )
2148 
2149  layer = 5; // Force subsequent materials to reset the layer.
2150 
2151 // float value = pm[6] + ( 80.0f * p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_layer_id ) * pm[5];
2152  float value = pm[6] + ( 150.0f * 5 ) * pm[5];
2153 
2154  GXWGFifo.u8 = GX_LOAD_XF_REG;
2155  GXWGFifo.u16 = 0;
2156  GXWGFifo.u16 = 0x1025;
2157  GXWGFifo.f32 = value;
2158 
2159 // for ( int mesh = 0; mesh < ( p_scene->m_num_opaque_meshes + p_scene->m_num_pre_semitrans_meshes ); mesh++ )
2160  for ( int mesh = 0; mesh < ( p_scene->m_num_filled_meshes ); mesh++ )
2161 
2162  {
2163  sMesh * p_mesh = p_scene->mpp_mesh_list[mesh];
2164 
2165 // if( frustum_check_sphere( light, p_scene->m_opaque_meshes[e]->m_sphere ))
2166  float by;
2167 
2168 // if ( p_mesh->mp_mod )
2169 // {
2171 // by = p_mesh->mp_mod->offset[Y];
2172 // }
2173 // else
2174 // {
2175  by = p_mesh->m_bottom_y;
2176 // }
2177 
2178  if ( ( p_mesh->m_flags & sMesh::MESH_FLAG_VISIBLE ) &&
2179  frustum_check_sphere( light, p_mesh->mp_dl->m_sphere ) &&
2180  ( g_shadow_object_pos[Y] > by ) &&
2181  !( p_mesh->m_flags & sMesh::MESH_FLAG_NO_SKATER_SHADOW ) )
2182  {
2183 
2184 // if ( (int)p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_layer_id == g_kill_layer ) return;
2185 
2186  // Deal with cloned pos pools.
2187  if ( p_mesh->mp_dl->mp_pos_pool )
2188  {
2189  array_base = -1;
2190  GX::SetArray( GX_VA_POS, p_mesh->mp_dl->mp_pos_pool, sizeof( float ) * 3 );
2191  }
2192  else
2193  {
2194  // Deal with verts outside of 65535.
2195  if ( p_mesh->mp_dl->m_array_base != (uint32)array_base )
2196  {
2197  array_base = p_mesh->mp_dl->m_array_base;
2198 
2199  // Assumes that this isn't a skinned object.
2200  GX::SetArray( GX_VA_POS, &p_scene->mp_pos_pool[p_mesh->mp_dl->m_array_base*3], sizeof( float ) * 3 );
2201  }
2202  }
2203 
2204  GX::CallDisplayList ( &p_mesh->mp_dl[1], p_mesh->mp_dl->m_size );
2205 
2206 
2207 // submit_mesh( p_scene, p_mesh, p_posNormBuffer, p_bone_xform, p_instance_xform, &array_base, &col_base, &layer, pm, &world_fog, flags );
2208  }
2209  }
2210  Nx::CFog::sEnableFog( true );
2211  world_fog = true;
2212  }

◆ cull_scene()

int NxNgc::cull_scene ( sScene *  p_scene,
uint32  flags 
)

См. определение в файле render.cpp строка 2740

2741 {
2742  int meshes_visible = 0;
2743 
2744  // Cull all meshes.
2745  sMesh ** pp_mesh = p_scene->mpp_mesh_list;
2746 
2747  for( int e = 0; e < p_scene->m_num_filled_meshes; ++e )
2748  {
2749  sMesh * p_mesh = pp_mesh[e];
2750  if( ( p_mesh->m_flags & sMesh::MESH_FLAG_ACTIVE ) && ( p_mesh->GetVisibility() & EngineGlobals.viewport ) )
2751  {
2752  Mth::Vector sphere = p_mesh->mp_dl->m_sphere;
2753 
2754  // Frustum cull this set of meshes, using the associated bounding box.
2755  if( frustum_check_sphere( sphere ))
2756  {
2757  // Sphere is visible.
2758  if( ( flags & vRENDER_OCCLUDED ) )
2759  {
2760  if ( TestSphereAgainstOccluders( &sphere ) )
2761  {
2762  // Occluded.
2763  p_mesh->m_flags &= ~sMesh::MESH_FLAG_VISIBLE;
2764  }
2765  else
2766  {
2767  // Not occluded.
2768  p_mesh->m_flags |= sMesh::MESH_FLAG_VISIBLE;
2769  ++meshes_visible;
2770  }
2771 
2772  }
2773  else
2774  {
2775  // Sphere being visible is enough.
2776  p_mesh->m_flags |= sMesh::MESH_FLAG_VISIBLE;
2777  ++meshes_visible;
2778  }
2779  }
2780  else
2781  {
2782  // Sphere not visible.
2783  p_mesh->m_flags &= ~sMesh::MESH_FLAG_VISIBLE;
2784  }
2785  }
2786  else
2787  {
2788  // Force to be not visible.
2789  p_mesh->m_flags &= ~sMesh::MESH_FLAG_VISIBLE;
2790  }
2791  }
2792  return meshes_visible;
2793 
2794 // make_scene_visible( p_scene );
2795 // return p_scene->m_num_filled_meshes;
2796 }

Перекрестные ссылки EngineGlobals, Gfx::flags, frustum_check_sphere(), NxNgc::sMesh::GetVisibility(), NxNgc::sMesh::m_flags, NxNgc::sScene::m_num_filled_meshes, NxNgc::sDLHeader::m_sphere, NxNgc::sMesh::MESH_FLAG_ACTIVE, NxNgc::sMesh::MESH_FLAG_VISIBLE, NxNgc::sMesh::mp_dl, NxNgc::sScene::mpp_mesh_list, TestSphereAgainstOccluders(), NxNgc::sEngineGlobals::viewport и vRENDER_OCCLUDED.

1875  if( p_transform == NULL )
1876  {
1877  p_bbox_transform = NULL;
1878  }
1879  else
1880  {
1881  p_bbox_transform = &bbox_transform;
1882

1884  bbox_transform.m[0][1] = ( *p_transform ).GetRight().GetY();
1885  bbox_transform.m[0][2] = ( *p_transform ).GetRight().GetZ();

1887

1890  bbox_transform.m[1][2] = ( *p_transform ).GetUp().GetZ();

1899  bbox_transform.m[3][1] = p_transform->GetPos().GetY();

1902  }
1903 }

◆ sort_by_material_draw_order()

static int NxNgc::sort_by_material_draw_order ( const void *  p1,
const void *  p2 
)
static

См. определение в файле scene.cpp строка 45

46 {
47  sMesh *p_mesh1 = *((sMesh**)p1 );
48  sMesh *p_mesh2 = *((sMesh**)p2 );
49  sMaterialHeader *p_material1 = p_mesh1->mp_dl->m_material.p_header;
50  sMaterialHeader *p_material2 = p_mesh2->mp_dl->m_material.p_header;
51 
52  Dbg_Assert( p_material1 != NULL );
53  Dbg_Assert( p_material2 != NULL );
54 
55  if( p_material1->m_draw_order == p_material2->m_draw_order )
56  {
57  // Have to do some special case processing for the situation where two or more meshes have the same draw order, but only some are
58  // marked as being dynamically sorted. In such a situation the non dynamically sorted ones should come first.
59  if( ( p_material1->m_flags & (1<<0) ) == ( p_material2->m_flags & (1<<0) ) )
60  {
61  if( p_material1 == p_material2 )
62  {
63  // Same material, no further sorting required.
64  return 0;
65  }
66  else
67  {
68  // If the blend mode is the same, sort by material address.
69  if( p_material1->m_base_blend == p_material2->m_base_blend )
70  {
71  // If the pixel shaders are the same, sort by material address, otherwise sort by pixel shader value.
72  if( p_material1->m_texture_dl_id == p_material2->m_texture_dl_id )
73  {
74  return ((uint32)p_material1 > (uint32)p_material2 ) ? 1 : -1;
75  }
76  else
77  {
78  return ((uint32)p_material1->m_texture_dl_id < (uint32)p_material2->m_texture_dl_id ) ? 1 : -1;
79  }
80  }
81  else
82  {
83  return ((uint32)p_material1->m_base_blend > (uint32)p_material2->m_base_blend ) ? 1 : -1;
84  }
85  }
86  }
87  else if( p_material1->m_flags & (1<<0) )
88  {
89  return 1;
90  }
91  return -1;
92  }
93  return ( p_material1->m_draw_order > p_material2->m_draw_order ) ? 1 : -1;
94 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxNgc::sMaterialHeader::m_base_blend, NxNgc::sMaterialHeader::m_draw_order, NxNgc::sMaterialHeader::m_flags, NxNgc::sDLHeader::m_material, NxNgc::sMaterialHeader::m_texture_dl_id, NxNgc::sMesh::mp_dl, p1, p2 и NxNgc::sDLHeader::p_header.

Используется в NxNgc::sScene::SortMeshes().

Граф вызова функции:

◆ hide_mesh()

static void NxNgc::hide_mesh ( uint32  mask,
sCASData *  p_cas_data,
uint32  num_entries,
sMesh *  p_mesh 
)
static

См. определение в файле scene.cpp строка 112

113 {
114  uint16 index_workbuffer[INDEX_WORKBUFFER_SIZE][MAX_INDEX_WIDTH];
115  uint32 new_indices_index = 0;
116 
117  int index_strip_len[MAX_STRIPS];
118  int num_strips = 0;
119 
120  // Clear strips.
121  for ( int lp = 0; lp < MAX_STRIPS; lp++ )
122  {
123  index_strip_len[lp] = 0;
124  }
125 
126  unsigned char * p_start = (unsigned char *)&p_mesh->mp_dl[1];
127  unsigned char * p_end = &p_start[p_mesh->mp_dl->m_size];
128  p_start = &p_start[p_mesh->mp_dl->m_index_offset]; // Skip to actual 1st GDBegin.
129  unsigned char * p8 = p_start;
130 
131  uint8 begin_token = p8[0]; // Save token for use when rebuilding mesh.
132 
133  int stride = p_mesh->mp_dl->m_index_stride;
134 
135  int w;
136 
137  while ( p8 < p_end )
138  {
139  if ( ( p8[0] & 0xf8 ) == GX_TRIANGLESTRIP )
140  {
141  // Found a triangle strip - parse it.
142  int num_verts = ( p8[1] << 8 ) | p8[2];
143  p8 += 3; // Skip GDBegin
144 
145  uint16 idx0[MAX_INDEX_WIDTH];
146  uint16 idx1[MAX_INDEX_WIDTH];
147  uint16 idx2[MAX_INDEX_WIDTH];
148 
149  for ( w = 0; w < stride; w++ ) { idx1[w] = ( p8[0] << 8 ) | p8[1]; p8 += 2; }
150  for ( w = 0; w < stride; w++ ) { idx2[w] = ( p8[0] << 8 ) | p8[1]; p8 += 2; }
151 
152  for ( int v = 2; v < num_verts; v++ )
153  {
154  // Read next index to form triangle.
155  for ( w = 0; w < stride; w++ ) idx0[w] = idx1[w];
156  for ( w = 0; w < stride; w++ ) idx1[w] = idx2[w];
157  for ( w = 0; w < stride; w++ ) { idx2[w] = ( p8[0] << 8 ) | p8[1]; p8 += 2; }
158 
159  // There shuold be no degenerate triangles.
160  // ...check against every CAS entry.
161  bool keep = true;
162  for( uint32 entry = 0; entry < num_entries; ++entry )
163  {
164  // Check this CAS entry has the correct mask...
165  if( p_cas_data[entry].mask & mask )
166  {
167  // ...and the right mesh...
168  uint32 mesh = p_cas_data[entry].data0 >> 16;
169 
170  // The CAS data is ordered first in increasing mesh size - so we can early out here if applicable.
171  if ( mesh > p_mesh->mp_dl->m_mesh_index )
172  {
173  break;
174  }
175 
176  if ( mesh == p_mesh->mp_dl->m_mesh_index )
177  {
178  // ...and the correct index.
179  uint32 i0 = ( p_cas_data[entry].data0 & 0xFFFF );
180 
181  // The CAS data is next ordered in increasing size of i0 - so we can early out here if applicable.
182  if ( i0 > idx0[0] )
183  {
184  break;
185  }
186 
187  uint32 i1 = ( p_cas_data[entry].data1 >> 16 );
188  uint32 i2 = ( p_cas_data[entry].data1 & 0xFFFF );
189  if ( ( i0 == idx0[0] ) && ( i1 == idx1[0] ) && ( i2 == idx2[0] ) )
190  {
191  keep = false;
192 
193  break;
194  }
195  }
196  }
197  }
198 
199  // Copy index.
200  if ( keep )
201  {
202  if ( index_strip_len[num_strips] )
203  {
204  // Already put 1st triangle in, just add index.
205  for ( w = 0; w < stride; w++ ) index_workbuffer[new_indices_index][w] = idx2[w];
206  new_indices_index++;
207  index_strip_len[num_strips]++;
208  }
209  else
210  {
211  // 1st triangle, so add all 3 verts.
212  for ( w = 0; w < stride; w++ ) index_workbuffer[new_indices_index][w] = idx0[w];
213  new_indices_index ++;
214  for ( w = 0; w < stride; w++ ) index_workbuffer[new_indices_index][w] = idx1[w];
215  new_indices_index ++;
216  for ( w = 0; w < stride; w++ ) index_workbuffer[new_indices_index][w] = idx2[w];
217  new_indices_index ++;
218  index_strip_len[num_strips] += 3;
219  }
220  }
221  else
222  {
223  // If we don't keep this tri & we already started a strip, we need
224  // to start a new strip.
225  if ( index_strip_len[num_strips] )
226  {
227  // Need to start a new strip.
228  num_strips++;
229  }
230  }
231  }
232  // Start a new strip if we put data in this one.
233  if ( index_strip_len[num_strips] )
234  {
235  // Need to start a new strip.
236  num_strips++;
237  }
238  }
239  else
240  {
241  break;
242  }
243  }
244  do_audio_update();
245 
246  Dbg_MsgAssert( new_indices_index <= INDEX_WORKBUFFER_SIZE, ( "Too many indices in new mesh: %d\n", new_indices_index ) );
247 
248  // See if we'll fit in the existing buffer.
249  uint32 new_size = ( 3 * num_strips ) + ( sizeof( uint16 ) * stride * new_indices_index ) + p_mesh->mp_dl->m_index_offset;
250 
251 // OSReport( "New: %d Old: %d Diff: %d\n", new_size, p_mesh->mp_dl->m_size, p_mesh->mp_dl->m_size - new_size );
252 
253 // if ( new_size > p_mesh->mp_dl->m_original_dl_size )
254 // {
255 // // Need to allocate a new buffer for this.
256 // }
257 
258  if ( new_size <= p_mesh->mp_dl->m_original_dl_size )
259  {
260  p8 = p_start;
261  int buffer_index = 0;
262 
263  for ( int strip = 0; strip < num_strips; strip++ )
264  {
265  *p8++ = begin_token;
266  *p8++ = (uint8)(index_strip_len[strip] >> 8 );
267  *p8++ = (uint8)(index_strip_len[strip] & 0xff );
268  for ( int index = 0; index < index_strip_len[strip]; index++ )
269  {
270  for ( w = 0; w < stride; w++ )
271  {
272  *p8++ = (uint8)(index_workbuffer[buffer_index][w] >> 8 );
273  *p8++ = (uint8)(index_workbuffer[buffer_index][w] & 0xff );
274  }
275  buffer_index++;
276  }
277  }
278  // Set new size of display list.
279  int new_rounded_size = ( new_size + 31 ) & ~31;
280  p_mesh->mp_dl->m_size = new_rounded_size;
281 
282  // Pad the DL with 0s to avoid spurious crap at the end & flush cache.
283  int pad_size = new_rounded_size - new_size;
284  for ( int pad = 0; pad < pad_size; pad++ ) *p8++ = 0;
285 
286  DCFlushRange( &p_mesh->mp_dl[1], new_rounded_size );
287  }
288  else
289  {
290 #ifdef __NOPT_FINAL__
291  OSReport( "Warning: DL too big after hide_mesh - New: %d Old: %d Diff: %d\n", new_size, p_mesh->mp_dl->m_size, p_mesh->mp_dl->m_size - new_size );
292 #else
293  Dbg_MsgAssert( false, ( "Error: DL too big after hide_mesh - New: %d Old: %d Diff: %d\n", new_size, p_mesh->mp_dl->m_size, p_mesh->mp_dl->m_size - new_size ) );
294 #endif // __NOPT_FINAL__
295  }
296  do_audio_update();
297 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxNgc::sCASData::data0, NxNgc::sCASData::data1, do_audio_update(), Dbg::if(), NxXbox::index_workbuffer, NxXbox::INDEX_WORKBUFFER_SIZE, NxNgc::sDLHeader::m_index_offset, NxNgc::sDLHeader::m_index_stride, NxNgc::sDLHeader::m_mesh_index, NxNgc::sDLHeader::m_size и NxNgc::sMesh::mp_dl.

Используется в NxNgc::sScene::HidePolys().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ LoadScene()

sScene * NxNgc::LoadScene ( const char *  Filename,
sScene *  pScene 
)

См. определение в файле scene.cpp строка 772

773 {
774  return NULL;
775 }

◆ DeleteScene()

void NxNgc::DeleteScene ( sScene *  pScene)

См. определение в файле scene.cpp строка 779

780 {
781 // // Iterate through the table of materials, deleting them.
782 // for ( int lp = 0; lp < pScene->m_num_materials; lp++ )
783 // {

813 {
814  if ( !p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header ) return;
815 
816  // Construct the DLs.
817  uint32 size;
818 
819  Mem::Manager::sHandle().TopDownHeap()->PushAlign( 32 );
820 #define DL_BUILD_SIZE (8*1024)
821  uint8 * p_build_dl = new (Mem::Manager::sHandle().TopDownHeap()) uint8[DL_BUILD_SIZE];
822 
823  // Build the texture upload DL.
824  DCFlushRange ( p_build_dl, DL_BUILD_SIZE );
825 
826  GX::begin( p_build_dl, DL_BUILD_SIZE );
827 
828 // multi_mesh( p_mesh, p_scene );
829 
830  multi_mesh( p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header,
831  &p_scene->mp_material_pass[p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_pass_item],
832  bl,
833  tx );
834 
835  size = GX::end();
836 
837  DCFlushRange ( p_build_dl, DL_BUILD_SIZE );
838 
839  if ( size && ( size <= p_scene->mp_texture_dl[p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_texture_dl_id].m_dl_size ) )
840  {
841 // p_mesh->mp_dl->mp_texture_dl = new uint8[size];
842

845 
846  p_scene->mp_texture_dl[p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_texture_dl_id].m_dl_size = (uint16)size;
847  }
848  else
849  {
850 // p_mesh->mp_dl->mp_texture_dl = NULL;
851 // p_mesh->mp_dl->m_texture_dl_size = 0;
852  }

857  delete p_build_dl;
858 }

928  GX::SetTevOrder( GX_TEVSTAGE0, GX_TEXCOORD_NULL, GX_TEXMAP_NULL, GX_COLOR0A0, GX_TEXCOORD_NULL, GX_TEXMAP_NULL, GX_COLOR0A0 );

936

940  GX::SetTevKColor( GX_KCOLOR0, (GXColor){8,8,8,255} );

946  GX::SetTexChanTevIndCull( 0, 1, 1, 0, GX_CULL_NONE );
947  return;
948  }
949 
950 
951 
952 
953 
954 
955 
956 // if ( g_dl /*&& !( p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_flags & (1<<3) )*/ )
957 // if ( g_dl/* && !( p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_flags & (1<<3) )*/ )
958  if ( g_dl && !( p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_flags & ((1<<3)|(1<<4)) ) )
959  {
961 // {
962 // g_material_id = p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_material_dl_id;
963 //
964 // if ( pScene->mp_blend_dl[g_material_id].mp_dl && pScene->mp_blend_dl[g_material_id].m_dl_size )
965 // {
967 // multi_mesh( p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header,
968 // &pScene->mp_material_pass[p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_pass_item],
969 // true,
970 // false );
971 // }
972 // }
973 
974  int tex_id = (int)p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_texture_dl_id;
975  GX::CallDisplayList( pScene->mp_texture_dl[tex_id].mp_dl, pScene->mp_texture_dl[tex_id].m_dl_size );
976  }
977  else
978  {
979  multi_mesh( p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header,
980  &pScene->mp_material_pass[p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_pass_item],
981  true,
982  true,
983  p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_flags & (1<<6) ? true : false,
984  p_mesh->mp_dl->mp_object_header->m_num_skin_verts ? false : true );
985  }
986 
987  // See if we need to upload env mapping matrices.
988  sMaterialHeader * p_mat = p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header;
989  sMaterialPassHeader *p_pass = &pScene->mp_material_pass[p_mat->m_pass_item];
990 
991  // Set Comploc
992  u8 alphacutoff = p_mesh->mp_dl->m_material.p_header->m_alpha_cutoff;
993  GXBool comploc;
994 // if ( p_pass->m_texture.p_data && ( p_pass->m_texture.p_data->flags & NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_HAS_HOLES ) )
995  if ( alphacutoff > 0 )
996  {
997  comploc = GX_FALSE;
998  }
999  else
1000  {
1001  comploc = GX_TRUE;
1002  }
1003  comploc = GX_FALSE;
1004 
1005  if ( g_comploc != comploc )
1006  {
1007  g_comploc = comploc;
1008  GX::SetZCompLoc( comploc );
1009  }
1010 
1011 // GX::SetAlphaCompare(GX_GEQUAL, alphacutoff, GX_AOP_AND, GX_GEQUAL, alphacutoff );
1012 // GX::SetZCompLoc( GX_FALSE );
1013  GX::SetAlphaCompare(GX_GEQUAL, alphacutoff, GX_AOP_AND, GX_GEQUAL, alphacutoff );
1014 
1015  for ( int lp = 0; lp < p_mat->m_passes; lp++, p_pass++ )
1016  {
1017  if ( p_pass->m_flags & ( (1<<1) | (1<<2) ) )
1018  {
1019  // UV Wibbled or Environment mapped.
1020  GXTexMtx mtx;
1021  switch ( lp )
1022  {
1023  case 0:
1024  mtx = GX_TEXMTX0;
1025  break;
1026  case 1:
1027  mtx = GX_TEXMTX1;
1028  break;
1029  case 2:
1030  mtx = GX_TEXMTX2;
1031  break;
1032  case 3:
1033  mtx = GX_TEXMTX3;
1034  break;
1035  default:
1036  mtx = GX_IDENTITY;
1037  break;
1038  }
1039 
1040  if( p_pass->m_flags & (1<<1) )
1041  {
1042  // Env mapping.
1043  Mtx s, t, e, mv;
1044 
1045  MTXInvXpose((Mtx)&EngineGlobals.local_to_camera, mv );
1046 
1047  // Project bounding sphere into screen space to get a metric to scroll the environment map.
1048  f32 p[GX_PROJECTION_SZ];
1049  f32 vp[GX_VIEWPORT_SZ];
1050  float rx, ry; //, rz;
1051 
1052  GX::GetProjectionv( p );
1053  GX::GetViewportv( vp );
1054 
1055  float x = EngineGlobals.local_to_camera.getPosX();
1056  float y = EngineGlobals.local_to_camera.getPosY();
1057 // float z = EngineGlobals.local_to_camera.getPosZ();
1058 
1059  rx = -x; //EngineGlobals.local_to_camera.getRightX()*x + EngineGlobals.local_to_camera.getRightY()*y + EngineGlobals.local_to_camera.getRightZ()*z;
1060  ry = -y; //EngineGlobals.local_to_camera.getUpX()*x + EngineGlobals.local_to_camera.getUpY()*y + EngineGlobals.local_to_camera.getUpZ()*z;
1061 
1062 
1063 // MyGXProject( p_mesh->mp_dl->m_sphere[X],
1064 // p_mesh->mp_dl->m_sphere[Y],
1065 // p_mesh->mp_dl->m_sphere[Z],
1066 // (Mtx)&EngineGlobals.local_to_camera,
1067 // p, vp, &rx, &ry, &rz );
1068 
1069  float u;
1070  float v;
1071 
1072  float ut = (float)p_pass->m_u_tile;
1073  float vt = (float)p_pass->m_v_tile;
1074  ut = ( ut * (1.0f / (float)(1<<12)) );
1075  vt = ( vt * (1.0f / (float)(1<<12)) );
1076 
1077  u = ( rx * ( ENV_MAP_SCROLL_SCALE * ut ) );
1078  v = ( ry * ( ENV_MAP_SCROLL_SCALE * vt ) );
1079 
1080  u -= (float)(int)u; // Keep within +/-1.
1081  v -= (float)(int)v;
1082 
1083  // Create the rotational component.
1084  MTXScale( s, 0.5f * ut, -0.5f * vt, 0.0f );
1085  MTXTrans( t, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.0f );
1086  MTXConcat( t, s, e );
1087 
1088  MTXConcat(e, mv, e);
1089 
1090  e[0][3] += u;
1091  e[1][3] += v;
1092 
1093  GX::LoadTexMtxImm(e, mtx, GX_MTX2x4);
1094  }
1095  else
1096  {
1097  if ( p_pass->m_uv_enabled )
1098  {
1099  // Explicit matrix.
1100  Mtx real;
1101 // MTXCopy( p_pass->mp_explicit_wibble->m_matrix, real );
1102 
1103 // real[0][3] = ( p_pass->mp_explicit_wibble->m_matrix[0][3] * -real[0][0] ) + ( p_pass->mp_explicit_wibble->m_matrix[1][3] * -real[0][1] );
1104 // real[1][3] = ( p_pass->mp_explicit_wibble->m_matrix[0][3] * -real[1][0] ) + ( p_pass->mp_explicit_wibble->m_matrix[1][3] * -real[1][1] );
1105 
1106  real[0][0] = ( (float)p_pass->m_uv_mat[0] ) * ( 1.0f / ((float)(1<<12)) );
1107  real[0][1] = -( (float)p_pass->m_uv_mat[1] ) * ( 1.0f / ((float)(1<<12)) );
1108  real[0][2] = 1.0f;
1109  real[0][3] = ( (float)p_pass->m_uv_mat[2] ) * ( 1.0f / ((float)(1<<12)) ) - 1.0f;
1110 
1111  real[1][0] = ( (float)p_pass->m_uv_mat[1] ) * ( 1.0f / ((float)(1<<12)) );
1112  real[1][1] = ( (float)p_pass->m_uv_mat[0] ) * ( 1.0f / ((float)(1<<12)) );
1113  real[1][2] = 1.0f;
1114  real[1][3] = ( (float)p_pass->m_uv_mat[3] ) * ( 1.0f / ((float)(1<<12)) ) - 1.0f;
1115  GX::LoadTexMtxImm( real, mtx, GX_MTX2x4 );
1116  }
1117  else
1118  {
1119  // Wibbled.
1120  float uoff, voff, t;
1121 
1122  t = (float)Tmr::GetTime() * 0.001f;
1123 
1124  Mtx m;
1125 
1126  sMaterialUVWibble * p_uv = &pScene->mp_uv_wibble[p_pass->m_uv_wibble_index];
1127 
1128  uoff = ( t * p_uv->m_u_vel ) + ( p_uv->m_u_amp * sinf( p_uv->m_u_freq * t + p_uv->m_u_phase ));
1129  voff = ( t * p_uv->m_v_vel ) + ( p_uv->m_v_amp * sinf( p_uv->m_v_freq * t + p_uv->m_v_phase ));
1130 
1131  // Reduce offset mod 16 and put it in the range -8 to +8.
1132  uoff += 8.0f;
1133  uoff -= (float)(( (int)uoff >> 4 ) << 4 );
1134  voff += 8.0f;
1135  voff -= (float)(( (int)voff >> 4 ) << 4 );
1136 
1137  uoff = ( uoff < 0.0f ) ? ( uoff + 8.0f ) : ( uoff - 8.0f );
1138  voff = ( voff < 0.0f ) ? ( voff + 8.0f ) : ( voff - 8.0f );
1139 
1140  MTXTrans( m, uoff, voff, 0.0f );
1141 
1142  GX::LoadTexMtxImm(m, mtx, GX_MTX2x4);
1143  }
1144  }
1145  }
1146  }
1147 }

Перекрестные ссылки GX::CallDisplayList(), EngineGlobals, g_comploc, g_dl, NsMatrix::getPosX(), NsMatrix::getPosY(), GX::GetProjectionv(), Tmr::GetTime(), GX::GetViewportv(), gOverDraw, GX::LoadTexMtxImm(), NxNgc::sEngineGlobals::local_to_camera, NxNgc::sMaterialHeader::m_alpha_cutoff, NxNgc::sMaterialHeader::m_flags, NxNgc::sMaterialPassHeader::m_flags, NxNgc::sDLHeader::m_material, NxNgc::sObjectHeader::m_num_skin_verts, NxNgc::sMaterialHeader::m_pass_item, NxNgc::sMaterialHeader::m_passes, NxNgc::sMaterialHeader::m_texture_dl_id, NxNgc::sMaterialUVWibble::m_u_amp, NxNgc::sMaterialUVWibble::m_u_freq, NxNgc::sMaterialUVWibble::m_u_phase, NxNgc::sMaterialPassHeader::m_u_tile, NxNgc::sMaterialUVWibble::m_u_vel, NxNgc::sMaterialPassHeader::m_uv_enabled, NxNgc::sMaterialPassHeader::m_uv_mat, NxNgc::sMaterialPassHeader::m_uv_wibble_index, NxNgc::sMaterialUVWibble::m_v_amp, NxNgc::sMaterialUVWibble::m_v_freq, NxNgc::sMaterialUVWibble::m_v_phase, NxNgc::sMaterialPassHeader::m_v_tile, NxNgc::sMaterialUVWibble::m_v_vel, NxNgc::sMesh::mp_dl, NxNgc::sDLHeader::mp_object_header, multi_mesh(), NxNgc::sDLHeader::p_header, GX::SetAlphaCompare(), GX::SetBlendMode(), GX::SetChanAmbColor(), GX::SetChanCtrl(), GX::SetChanMatColor(), GX::SetFog(), GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap(), GX::SetTevColorInOp(), GX::SetTevKColor(), GX::SetTevKSel(), GX::SetTevOrder(), GX::SetTexChanTevIndCull(), GX::SetZCompLoc(), GX::SetZMode(), Nx::x и Nx::y.

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ LoadTexture()

sTexture * NxNgc::LoadTexture ( const char *  p_filename)

См. определение в файле texture.cpp строка 68

69 {
70  sTexture *p_texture = NULL;
71 
72  void *p_FH = File::Open( p_filename, "rb" );
73 
74  if( p_FH )
75  {
76  uint32 version;
77  uint32 checksum;
78  uint32 width;
79  uint32 height;
80  uint32 depth;
81  uint32 levels;
82  uint32 rwidth;
83  uint32 rheight;
84  uint16 alphamap;
85  uint16 hasholes;
86 
87  uint32 FileSize = File::GetFileSize(p_FH);
88 
89  // Load the actual texture
90 
91  p_texture = new sTexture();
92 
93  File::Read( &version, 4, 1, p_FH );
94  File::Read( &checksum, 4, 1, p_FH );
95  File::Read( &width, 4, 1, p_FH );
96  File::Read( &height, 4, 1, p_FH );
97  File::Read( &depth, 4, 1, p_FH );
98  File::Read( &levels, 4, 1, p_FH );
99  File::Read( &rwidth, 4, 1, p_FH );
100  File::Read( &rheight, 4, 1, p_FH );
101  File::Read( &alphamap, 2, 1, p_FH );
102  File::Read( &hasholes, 2, 1, p_FH );
103 
104  Dbg_MsgAssert( version <= TEXTURE_VERSION, ("Illegal texture version number: %d (The newest version we deal with is: %d)\n", version, TEXTURE_VERSION ));
105  Dbg_MsgAssert( depth == 32, ("We only deal with 32-bit textures.\n"));
106 
107  uint tsize = FileSize-(9*4);
108 
109  p_texture->flags = 0;
110  p_texture->flags |= NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_CHANNEL_GREEN;
111 
112  Mem::Manager::sHandle().BottomUpHeap()->PushAlign( 32 );
113  if ( tsize == ( width * height * 4 ) )
114  {
115  p_texture->format = (uint8)GX_TF_RGBA8;
116 
117  p_texture->pTexelData = new uint8[tsize];
118  p_texture->byte_size = tsize;
119  Dbg_MsgAssert(p_texture->pTexelData, ("couldn't allocate buffer for texture file %s\n", p_filename));
120  File::Read( p_texture->pTexelData, 1, tsize, p_FH );
121  }
122  else
123  {
124  p_texture->format = (uint8)GX_TF_CMPR;
125 
126  if ( alphamap )
127  {
128  tsize = tsize / 2;
129  }
130 
131  p_texture->pTexelData = new uint8[tsize];
132  p_texture->byte_size = tsize;
133  Dbg_MsgAssert(p_texture->pTexelData, ("couldn't allocate buffer for texture file %s\n", p_filename));
134  File::Read( p_texture->pTexelData, 1, tsize, p_FH );
135 
136  if ( alphamap )
137  {
138  p_texture->pAlphaData = new uint8[tsize];
139  Dbg_MsgAssert(p_texture->pAlphaData, ("couldn't allocate buffer for alpha file %s\n", p_filename));
140  File::Read( p_texture->pAlphaData, 1, tsize, p_FH );
141  p_texture->flags |= NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_HAS_ALPHA;
142  }
143  }
144  Mem::Manager::sHandle().BottomUpHeap()->PopAlign();
145 
146  p_texture->Checksum = checksum;
147  p_texture->BaseWidth = width;
148  p_texture->BaseHeight = height;
149  p_texture->Levels = levels;
150  p_texture->ActualWidth = rwidth;
151  p_texture->ActualHeight = rheight;
152  p_texture->flags |= hasholes ? NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_HAS_HOLES : 0;
153 
154  File::Close( p_FH );
155  }
156 
157  return p_texture;
158 }

Перекрестные ссылки NxNgc::sTexture::ActualHeight, NxNgc::sTexture::ActualWidth, NxNgc::sTexture::BaseHeight, NxNgc::sTexture::BaseWidth, Mem::Manager::BottomUpHeap(), NxNgc::sTexture::byte_size, NxNgc::sTexture::Checksum, File::Close(), NxNgc::sTexture::flags, NxNgc::sTexture::format, File::GetFileSize(), NxNgc::sTexture::Levels, File::Open(), NxNgc::sTexture::pAlphaData, Mem::Allocator::PopAlign(), NxNgc::sTexture::pTexelData, Mem::Allocator::PushAlign(), File::Read(), Mem::Manager::sHandle(), NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_CHANNEL_GREEN, NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_HAS_ALPHA, NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_HAS_HOLES и TEXTURE_VERSION.

Используется в Nx::CNgcTexture::plat_load_texture().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ GetTexture()

sTexture * NxNgc::GetTexture ( uint32  checksum)

См. определение в файле texture.cpp строка 164

165 {
166  if( pTextureTable )
167  {
168  pTextureTable->IterateStart();
169  sTexture *p_tex = pTextureTable->IterateNext();
170  while( p_tex )
171  {
172  if( p_tex->Checksum == checksum )
173  {
174  return p_tex;
175  }
176  p_tex = pTextureTable->IterateNext();
177  }
178  }
179  return NULL;
180 }

3367  csel[lp] = GX_TEV_KCSEL_1;
3368  sel[lp] = false;

3377  {
3378  texmtx[lp] = GX_IDENTITY;
3379  }
3380 
3381  settex = false;
3382 }

3574  break;
3575  case vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE:
3576  default:
3577  // Replace with this texture. Shouldn't ever be used, but here for compatibility.
3578  if(bl && _su)

3591  stage_id++;
3592  break;
3593  }
3594 }

◆ multi_add_texture()

3597 {
3598  // Mesh
3599  GXTexCoordID u_id = (GXTexCoordID)(((int)GX_TEXCOORD0)+uv_id);
3600 
3601  if ( flags & ( (1<<1) | (1<<2) ) )
3602  {
3603  // Environment mapped or UV wibbled.
3604  GXTexMtx mtx;
3605  if ( flags & (1<<1) )
3606  {
3607  switch ( layer )
3608  {
3609  case 0:
3610  mtx = GX_TEXMTX0;
3611  break;
3612  case 1:
3613  mtx = GX_TEXMTX1;
3614  break;
3615  case 2:
3616  mtx = GX_TEXMTX2;
3617  break;
3618  case 3:
3619  mtx = GX_TEXMTX3;
3620  break;
3621  default:
3622  mtx = GX_IDENTITY;
3623  break;
3624  }
3625 
3626 
3627  // Force repeat mode for environment mapping & NRM uv generation.
3628  umode = GX_REPEAT;
3629  vmode = GX_REPEAT;
3630  if(tx && _ta)
3631  {
3632 // defer_gen[num_defer_gen].id = u_id;
3633 // defer_gen[num_defer_gen].type = GX_TG_MTX2x4;
3634 // defer_gen[num_defer_gen].src = GX_TG_NRM;
3635 // num_defer_gen++;
3636  GX::SetTexCoordGen( u_id, GX_TG_MTX2x4, GX_TG_NRM, GX_FALSE, GX_PTIDENTITY );
3637  texmtx[(int)u_id] = mtx;
3638  settex = true;
3639  }
3640  }
3641  else
3642  {
3643  switch ( layer )
3644  {
3645  case 0:
3646  mtx = GX_TEXMTX0;
3647  break;
3648  case 1:
3649  mtx = GX_TEXMTX1;
3650  break;
3651  case 2:
3652  mtx = GX_TEXMTX2;
3653  break;
3654  case 3:
3655  mtx = GX_TEXMTX3;
3656  break;
3657  default:
3658  mtx = GX_IDENTITY;
3659  break;
3660  }
3661 
3662 
3663  // Use texcoords for wibbling & offset matrix.
3664  if(tx && _ta)
3665  {
3666 // defer_gen[num_defer_gen].id = u_id;
3667 // defer_gen[num_defer_gen].type = GX_TG_MTX2x4;
3668 // defer_gen[num_defer_gen].src = (GXTexGenSrc)(((int)GX_TG_TEX0)+uv_id);
3669 // num_defer_gen++;
3670  GX::SetTexCoordGen( u_id, GX_TG_MTX2x4, (GXTexGenSrc)(((int)GX_TG_TEX0)+uv_tex_id), GX_FALSE, GX_PTIDENTITY );
3671  texmtx[(int)u_id] = mtx;
3672  settex = true;
3673  uv_tex_id++;
3674  }
3675  }
3676  }
3677  else
3678  {
3679  // Regular mapping.
3680  if(tx && _ta)
3681  {
3682 // defer_gen[num_defer_gen].id = u_id;
3683 // defer_gen[num_defer_gen].type = GX_TG_MTX2x4;
3684 // defer_gen[num_defer_gen].src = (GXTexGenSrc)(((int)GX_TG_TEX0)+uv_id);
3685 // num_defer_gen++;
3686  GX::SetTexCoordGen( u_id, GX_TG_MTX2x4, (GXTexGenSrc)(((int)GX_TG_TEX0)+uv_tex_id), GX_FALSE, GX_PTIDENTITY );
3687  texmtx[(int)u_id] = GX_IDENTITY;
3688  settex = true;
3689  uv_tex_id++;
3690  }
3691  }
3692  uv_id++;
3693 
3694  // Mat
3695  if ( map_id >= 8 ) return;
3696 
3697 #ifdef __PLAT_WN32__
3698  unsigned char tb = 1; //( 0 << 4 ) | layer;
3699  unsigned char ab = 1; //( 1 << 4 ) | layer;
3700 
3701  void * p_tex_data = (void *)((tb<<16)|(tb<<8)|tb);
3702  void * p_alpha_data = (p_texture->m_PaletteFormat & 1) ? (void *)((ab<<16)|(ab<<8)|ab) : NULL;
3703  GXTevSwapSel alpha_swap = GX_TEV_SWAP1;
3704  if ( (p_texture->m_PaletteFormat & 1) )
3705  {
3706  int channel = ( p_texture->m_PaletteFormat >> 8 ) & 255;
3707  switch ( channel )
3708  {
3709  case 0:
3710  default:
3711  alpha_swap = GX_TEV_SWAP1; // Green
3712  break;
3713  case 1:
3714  alpha_swap = GX_TEV_SWAP2; // Red
3715  break;
3716  case 2:
3717  alpha_swap = GX_TEV_SWAP3; // Blue
3718  break;
3719  }
3720  }
3721 
3722  int width = p_texture->m_Width[0];
3723  int height = p_texture->m_Height[0];
3724  int levels = p_texture->m_MipLevels + 1;
3725 #else
3726  void * p_tex_data = p_texture->pTexelData;
3727  bool has_alpha = ( p_texture->flags & NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_HAS_ALPHA ) ? true : false;
3728  void * p_alpha_data = has_alpha ? p_texture->pAlphaData : NULL;
3729  GXTevSwapSel alpha_swap = GX_TEV_SWAP1;
3730  if ( has_alpha )
3731  {
3732  switch ( ( p_texture->flags & NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_CHANNEL_MASK ) )
3733  {
3734  case NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_CHANNEL_GREEN:
3735  default:
3736  alpha_swap = GX_TEV_SWAP1; // Green
3737  break;
3738  case NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_CHANNEL_RED:
3739  alpha_swap = GX_TEV_SWAP2; // Red
3740  break;
3741  case NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_CHANNEL_BLUE:
3742  alpha_swap = GX_TEV_SWAP3; // Blue
3743  break;
3744  }
3745  }
3746  int width = p_texture->ActualWidth;
3747  int height = p_texture->ActualHeight;
3748  int levels = p_texture->Levels;
3749 #endif // __PLAT_WN32__
3750 // int reg_id = tev_id; //( tev_id > 1 ) ? 1 : tev_id; //( tev_id == 3 ) ? 2 : tev_id; // CPREV, C0, C1, C0.
3751  int reg_id = tev_id; // CPREV, C0, C1, C0.
3752 
3753  GXTevAlphaArg rasa;
3754  GXTevColorArg rasc;
3755  GXTevColorArg rasca;
3756  if ( correct_color )
3757  {
3758  rasa = GX_CA_A2;
3759  rasc = GX_CC_C2;
3760  rasca = GX_CC_A2;
3761  }
3762  else
3763  {
3764  rasa = GX_CA_RASA;
3765  rasc = GX_CC_RASC;
3766  rasca = GX_CC_RASA;
3767  }
3768 
3769  int cur_map = map_id + 1;
3770  int alpha_map = -1;
3771 
3772  if ( p_alpha_data )
3773  {
3774  switch ( blendmode )
3775  {
3776  case vBLEND_MODE_ADD:
3777  case vBLEND_MODE_SUBTRACT:
3778  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND:
3779  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN:
3780  case vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE:
3781  case vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE:
3782  if ( cur_map < 8 )
3783  {
3784  alpha_map = cur_map;
3785  cur_map++;
3786  }
3787  break;
3788  default:
3789  break;
3790  }
3791  }
3792 
3793 // GXTexObj texObj;
3794 // GXInitTexObj( &texObj, p_tex_data, width, height, ((GXTexFmt)p_texture->format), umode, vmode, levels > 1 ? GX_TRUE : GX_FALSE );
3795 // if ( levels > 1 )
3796 // {
3804 // GXInitTexObjLOD( &texObj, GX_LIN_MIP_LIN, GX_LINEAR, 0.0f, levels - 1, k, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE, GX_ANISO_1 );
3806 // }
3807 // else
3808 // {
3809 // GXInitTexObjLOD( &texObj, GX_LINEAR, GX_LINEAR, 0.0f, 0.0f, k, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE, GX_ANISO_1 );
3810 // }
3811 // GXLoadTexObj( &texObj, (GXTexMapID)(((int)GX_TEXMAP0)+map_id) );
3812 // GXSetTexCoordScaleManually( u_id, GX_TRUE, width, height );
3813 
3814 
3815  if(tx && _su)
3816  {
3817  void * p_td;
3818  if ( blendmode == vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN )
3819  {
3820  p_td = p_alpha_data;
3821  }
3822  else
3823  {
3824  p_td = p_tex_data;
3825  }
3826 
3827  if ( p_td )
3828  {
3829 #ifdef __PLAT_WN32__
3830  g_tex_off[layer] = GDGetCurrOffset();
3831 // printf( "\nAdded tex off: layer %d, off %d - %d %d %d %d", layer, g_tex_off[layer], _su, _tb, _tc, _ta );
3832 #endif // __PLAT_WN32__
3833  GX::UploadTexture( p_td,
3834  width,
3835  height,
3836 #ifdef __PLAT_WN32__
3837  /*( p_texture->m_PaletteFormat & 1 ) ? */GX_TF_CMPR/* : GX_TF_RGBA8*/,
3838 #else
3839  ((GXTexFmt)p_texture->format),
3840 #endif // __PLAT_WN32__
3841  umode,
3842  vmode,
3843  ( levels > 1 ? GX_TRUE : GX_FALSE ),
3844  ( levels > 1 ? GX_LIN_MIP_LIN : GX_LINEAR ),
3845  GX_LINEAR,
3846  0.0f,
3847  ( levels > 1 ? levels - 1.0f : 0.0f ),
3848  k,
3849  GX_FALSE,
3850  GX_TRUE,
3851  /*( layer == 0 ) ? GX_ANISO_2 :*/ GX_ANISO_1,
3852  (GXTexMapID)(((int)GX_TEXMAP0)+map_id) );
3853  }
3854  }
3855 
3856  if(tx && _su) GX::SetTexCoordScale( u_id, GX_TRUE, width, height );
3857 
3858  if ( alpha_map >= 0 )
3859  {
3860  switch ( blendmode )
3861  {
3862  case vBLEND_MODE_ADD:
3863  case vBLEND_MODE_SUBTRACT:
3864  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND:
3865  case vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE:
3866  case vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE:
3867  if(tx && _su)
3868  {
3869 #ifdef __PLAT_WN32__
3870  g_alpha_off[layer] = GDGetCurrOffset();
3871 // printf( "\nAdded alp off %d - %d %d %d %d", layer, _su, _tb, _tc, _ta );
3872 #endif // __PLAT_WN32__
3873  GX::UploadTexture( p_alpha_data,
3874  width,
3875  height,
3876 #ifdef __PLAT_WN32__
3877  /*( p_texture->m_PaletteFormat & 1 ) ? */GX_TF_CMPR/* : GX_TF_RGBA8*/,
3878 #else
3879  ((GXTexFmt)p_texture->format),
3880 #endif // __PLAT_WN32__
3881  umode,
3882  vmode,
3883  ( levels > 1 ? GX_TRUE : GX_FALSE ),
3884  ( levels > 1 ? GX_LIN_MIP_LIN : GX_LINEAR ),
3885  GX_LINEAR,
3886  0.0f,
3887  ( levels > 1 ? levels - 1.0f : 0.0f ),
3888  k,
3889  GX_FALSE,
3890  GX_TRUE,
3891  /*( layer == 0 ) ? GX_ANISO_2 :*/ GX_ANISO_1,
3892  (GXTexMapID)(((int)GX_TEXMAP0)+alpha_map) );
3893  }
3894 
3895  //if(tx && _su) GX::SetTexCoordScale( u_id, GX_TRUE, width, height );
3896  break;
3897  default:
3898  p_alpha_data = NULL;
3899  break;
3900  }
3901  }
3902 
3903  GXTexMapID t_id = (GXTexMapID)(((int)GX_TEXMAP0)+map_id);
3904  GXTevStageID s_id = (GXTevStageID)(((int)GX_TEVSTAGE0)+stage_id);
3905 
3906  GXColor col;
3907  if ( blendmode == vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN_FIXED )
3908  {
3909  col.r = fix;
3910  col.g = fix;
3911  col.b = fix;
3912  col.a = fix;
3913  }
3914  else
3915  {
3916  if ( ( blendmode == vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN ) & !p_alpha_data )
3917  {
3918  col.r = 255;
3919  col.g = 255;
3920  col.b = 255;
3921  col.a = 255;
3922  }
3923  else
3924  {
3925  col.r = matcol.r;
3926  col.g = matcol.g;
3927  col.b = matcol.b;
3928  col.a = fix;
3929  }
3930  }
3931 
3932  // Modulate material color.
3933  GXTevColorArg color_source = rasc;
3934  GXTevScale color_scale = GX_CS_SCALE_2;
3935  switch ( blendmode )
3936  {
3937  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN_FIXED:
3938  if(tx && _su) GX::SetTevKColor( (GXTevKColorID)(((int)GX_KCOLOR0)+tev_id), col );
3939  if(bl && _su)
3940  {
3941  csel[(int)s_id] = (GXTevKColorSel)(((int)GX_TEV_KCSEL_K0)+tev_id);
3942  asel[(int)s_id] = GX_TEV_KASEL_1;
3943  sel[(int)s_id] = true;
3944  }
3945 
3946  if(bl && _su)
3947  {
3948  ordt[(int)s_id] = GX_TEXCOORD0;
3949  ordm[(int)s_id] = GX_TEX_DISABLE;
3950  ordc[(int)s_id] = GX_COLOR0A0;
3951  ord[(int)s_id] = true;
3952  }
3953 
3954  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_ZERO, rasa, GX_CA_KONST, GX_CA_ZERO,
3955  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id),
3956  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
3957  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, rasca, GX_CC_KONST, GX_CC_ZERO,
3958  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id) );
3959  color_source = (GXTevColorArg)(((int)GX_CC_CPREV)+(reg_id*2));
3960  color_scale = GX_CS_SCALE_2;
3961  stage_id++;
3962  s_id = (GXTevStageID)(((int)GX_TEVSTAGE0)+stage_id);
3963  break;
3964  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN:
3965  {
3966  GXTevSwapSel aa;
3967 
3968 #ifdef __PLAT_WN32__
3969  int channel = ( p_texture->m_PaletteFormat >> 8 ) & 255;
3970  switch ( channel )
3971  {
3972  case 0:
3973  default:
3974  aa = GX_TEV_SWAP1; // Green
3975  break;
3976  case 1:
3977  aa = GX_TEV_SWAP2; // Blue
3978  break;
3979  case 2:
3980  aa = GX_TEV_SWAP3; // Red
3981  break;
3982  }
3983 #else
3984  switch ( ( p_texture->flags & NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_CHANNEL_MASK ) )
3985  {
3986  case NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_CHANNEL_GREEN:
3987  default:
3988  aa = GX_TEV_SWAP1; // Green
3989  break;
3990  case NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_CHANNEL_RED:
3991  aa = GX_TEV_SWAP2; // Blue
3992  break;
3993  case NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_CHANNEL_BLUE:
3994  aa = GX_TEV_SWAP3; // Red
3995  break;
3996  }
3997 #endif // __PLAT_WN32__
3998 
3999  if ( p_alpha_data )
4000  {
4001  if(bl && _su)
4002  {
4003  ordt[(int)s_id] = u_id;
4004  ordm[(int)s_id] = t_id;
4005  ordc[(int)s_id] = GX_COLOR0A0;
4006  ord[(int)s_id] = true;
4007  }
4008 
4009  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_ZERO, rasa, GX_CA_TEXA, GX_CA_ZERO,
4010  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id),
4011  GX_TEV_SWAP0, aa );
4012  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, rasca, GX_CC_TEXC, GX_CC_ZERO,
4013  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id) );
4014  }
4015  else
4016  {
4017  // No alpha, need to do same as BRIGHTEN_FIXED, but with a fix of 1.
4018  if(tx && _su) GX::SetTevKColor( (GXTevKColorID)(((int)GX_KCOLOR0)+tev_id), col );
4019  if(bl && _su)
4020  {
4021  csel[(int)s_id] = (GXTevKColorSel)(((int)GX_TEV_KCSEL_K0)+tev_id);
4022  asel[(int)s_id] = GX_TEV_KASEL_1;
4023  sel[(int)s_id] = true;
4024  }
4025 
4026  if(bl && _su)
4027  {
4028  ordt[(int)s_id] = GX_TEXCOORD0;
4029  ordm[(int)s_id] = GX_TEX_DISABLE;
4030  ordc[(int)s_id] = GX_COLOR0A0;
4031  ord[(int)s_id] = true;
4032  }
4033 
4034  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_ZERO, rasa, GX_CA_KONST, GX_CA_ZERO,
4035  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id),
4036  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
4037  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, rasca, GX_CC_KONST, GX_CC_ZERO,
4038  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id) );
4039  }
4040  }
4041  color_source = (GXTevColorArg)(((int)GX_CC_CPREV)+(reg_id*2));
4042  color_scale = GX_CS_SCALE_2;
4043  stage_id++;
4044  s_id = (GXTevStageID)(((int)GX_TEVSTAGE0)+stage_id);
4045  break;
4046  default:
4047  if ( alpha_map >= 0 )
4048  {
4049  if(tx && _su) GX::SetTevKColor( (GXTevKColorID)(((int)GX_KCOLOR0)+tev_id), col );
4050  if(bl && _su)
4051  {
4052  csel[(int)s_id] = (GXTevKColorSel)(((int)GX_TEV_KCSEL_K0)+tev_id);
4053  asel[(int)s_id] = GX_TEV_KASEL_1;
4054  sel[(int)s_id] = true;
4055  }
4056  GXTexMapID a_id = (GXTexMapID)(((int)GX_TEXMAP0)+alpha_map);
4057  if(bl && _su)
4058  {
4059  ordt[(int)s_id] = u_id;
4060  ordm[(int)s_id] = a_id;
4061  ordc[(int)s_id] = GX_COLOR0A0;
4062  ord[(int)s_id] = true;
4063  }
4064 
4065  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_TEXA, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO,
4066  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id),
4067  GX_TEV_SWAP0, alpha_swap );
4068  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, rasc, GX_CC_KONST, GX_CC_ZERO,
4069  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_4, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id) );
4070  color_source = (GXTevColorArg)(((int)GX_CC_CPREV)+(reg_id*2));
4071  color_scale = GX_CS_SCALE_2;
4072  stage_id++;
4073  s_id = (GXTevStageID)(((int)GX_TEVSTAGE0)+stage_id);
4074  }
4075  else
4076  {
4077  if ( ( col.r != 128 ) || ( col.g != 128 ) || ( col.b != 128 ) )
4078  {
4079  // Unique material color.
4080  if(tx && _su) GX::SetTevKColor( (GXTevKColorID)(((int)GX_KCOLOR0)+tev_id), col );
4081  if(bl && _su)
4082  {
4083  csel[(int)s_id] = (GXTevKColorSel)(((int)GX_TEV_KCSEL_K0)+tev_id);
4084  asel[(int)s_id] = GX_TEV_KASEL_1;
4085  sel[(int)s_id] = true;
4086  }
4087  if(bl && _su)
4088  {
4089  ordt[(int)s_id] = GX_TEXCOORD0;
4090  ordm[(int)s_id] = GX_TEX_DISABLE;
4091  ordc[(int)s_id] = GX_COLOR0A0;
4092  ord[(int)s_id] = true;
4093  }
4094 
4095  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, rasa, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO,
4096  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id),
4097  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
4098  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, rasc, GX_CC_KONST, GX_CC_ZERO,
4099  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_4, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id) );
4100  color_source = (GXTevColorArg)(((int)GX_CC_CPREV)+(reg_id*2));
4101  color_scale = GX_CS_SCALE_2;
4102  stage_id++;
4103  s_id = (GXTevStageID)(((int)GX_TEVSTAGE0)+stage_id);
4104  }
4105  else
4106  {
4107  // No need for material color stage.
4108  color_source = rasc;
4109  color_scale = GX_CS_SCALE_4;
4110  }
4111  }
4112  break;
4113  }
4114 
4115  // Set texture coordinates. Note: If p_tex is NULL, it means this layer is environment mapped.
4116 // if ( !(flags & MATFLAG_ENVIRONMENT) )
4117 // {
4118  //*p_uv_slot = uv_id;
4119 // uv_id++;
4120 // } else {
4121 // *p_uv_slot = -1;
4122 // }
4123 
4124  // Load this texture up into a temporary register for use later.
4125  // Note: conveniently, the 1st texture ends up in TEVPREV which means it will be fine
4126  // if no blends are performed.
4127  switch ( blendmode )
4128  {
4129  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN:
4130  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN_FIXED:
4131  // Just pass it on through...
4132  break;
4133  case vBLEND_MODE_ADD_FIXED:
4134  case vBLEND_MODE_SUB_FIXED:
4135  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_FIXED:
4136  case vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_FIXED:
4137  // If we didn't upload with the material color, upload here.
4138  if ( color_source == rasc )
4139  {
4140  if(tx && _su) GX::SetTevKColor( (GXTevKColorID)(((int)GX_KCOLOR0)+tev_id), col );
4141  }
4142  if(bl && _su)
4143  {
4144  csel[(int)s_id] = GX_TEV_KCSEL_1;
4145  asel[(int)s_id] = (GXTevKAlphaSel)(((int)GX_TEV_KASEL_K0_A)+tev_id);
4146  sel[(int)s_id] = true;
4147  }
4148 
4149  if(bl && _su)
4150  {
4151  ordt[(int)s_id] = u_id;
4152  ordm[(int)s_id] = t_id;
4153  ordc[(int)s_id] = GX_COLOR0A0;
4154  ord[(int)s_id] = true;
4155  }
4156 
4157  if ( ignore_alpha )
4158  {
4159  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_KONST, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO,
4160  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id),
4161  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
4162  }
4163  else
4164  {
4165  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_KONST, rasa, GX_CA_ZERO,
4166  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_4, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id),
4167  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
4168  }
4169  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_TEXC, color_source, GX_CC_ZERO,
4170  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, color_scale, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id) );
4171  stage_id++;
4172  break;
4173  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_PREVIOUS_MASK:
4174  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_INVERSE_PREVIOUS_MASK:
4175  if(bl && _su)
4176  {
4177  ordt[(int)s_id] = u_id;
4178  ordm[(int)s_id] = t_id;
4179  ordc[(int)s_id] = GX_COLOR0A0;
4180  ord[(int)s_id] = true;
4181  }
4182 
4183  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, (GXTevAlphaArg)(((int)GX_CA_APREV)+(reg_id-1)),
4184  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id),
4185  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
4186  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_TEXC, color_source, GX_CC_ZERO,
4187  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, color_scale, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id) );
4188  stage_id++;
4189  break;
4190  case vBLEND_MODE_ADD:
4191  case vBLEND_MODE_SUBTRACT:
4192  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND:
4193  case vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE:
4194  case vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE:
4195  default:
4196  // We need to add a stage, if we have an alpha map.
4197  if ( ( alpha_map >= 0 )/* && ( blendmode != vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE )*/ )
4198  {
4199 // // Set inputs.
4200 // GXTexMapID a_id = (GXTexMapID)(((int)GX_TEXMAP0)+alpha_map);

4214 // GX_TEV_SWAP0, alpha_swap ); // Alpha map is in Green/Red/Blue channel, so use this to swap it to the alpha channel.
4215 // }
4216 // else
4217 // {

4220 // GX_TEV_SWAP0, alpha_swap ); // Alpha map is in Green/Red/Blue channel, so use this to swap it to the alpha channel.
4221 // }

4223 // GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id) );
4224 // stage_id++;

4231  ordc[(int)s_id] = GX_COLOR0A0;
4232  ord[(int)s_id] = true;
4233  }
4234 
4235  if ( ignore_alpha )
4236  {

4238  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id),
4239  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 ); // Alpha map is in Green/Red/Blue channel, so use this to swap it to the alpha channel.
4240  }
4241  else

4244  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+reg_id),
4245  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 ); // Alpha map is in Green/Red/Blue channel, so use this to swap it to the alpha channel.
4246  }

4305  if ( tev_id > 0 ) {
4306  multi_add_layer ( blendmode, fix, bl, tx );
4307  } else {
4308  // Set blend mode for base layer.
4309  switch ( blendmode )
4310  {
4311  case vBLEND_MODE_ADD:
4312  case vBLEND_MODE_ADD_FIXED:
4313  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode( GX_BM_BLEND, GX_BL_SRCALPHA, GX_BL_ONE, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4314  break;
4315  case vBLEND_MODE_SUBTRACT:
4316  case vBLEND_MODE_SUB_FIXED:
4317  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode( GX_BM_SUBTRACT, GX_BL_ZERO, GX_BL_ZERO, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4318  break;
4319  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND:
4320  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_FIXED:
4321  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode( GX_BM_BLEND, GX_BL_SRCALPHA, GX_BL_INVSRCALPHA, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4322  break;
4323  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN:
4324  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN_FIXED:
4325  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode( GX_BM_BLEND, GX_BL_DSTCLR, GX_BL_ONE, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4326  break;
4327  case vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_FIXED:
4328  case vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE:
4329  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode( GX_BM_BLEND, GX_BL_ZERO, GX_BL_SRCALPHA, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4330  break;
4331  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_PREVIOUS_MASK:
4332  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_INVERSE_PREVIOUS_MASK:
4333  case vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE:
4334  default:
4335  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode( GX_BM_NONE, GX_BL_ONE, GX_BL_ONE, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4336  break;
4337  }
4338  }
4339  layer_id++;
4340 
4341  tev_id++;
4342  map_id = cur_map;
4343 #ifdef __PLAT_WN32__
4344  g_num_tex = map_id;
4345 #endif // __PLAT_WN32__
4346 }

Используется в _multi_mesh().

4562  settex = false;
4563 }

Перекрестные ссылки _su, _ta, asel, correct_color, csel, Gfx::flags, ord, ordc, ordm, ordt, sel, GX::SetAlphaCompare(), GX::SetCurrMtxPosTex03(), GX::SetCurrMtxTex47(), GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap(), GX::SetTevColorInOp(), GX::SetTevKSel(), GX::SetTevOrder(), settex, GX::SetTexChanTevIndCull(), GX::SetTexCoordGen(), GX::SetTexCoordScale(), stage_id, texmtx, NxPs2::render::tx, uv_id, vBLEND_MODE_SUB_FIXED и vBLEND_MODE_SUBTRACT.

Используется в _multi_mesh().

Граф вызовов:
Граф вызова функции:

◆ _multi_mesh()

static void NxNgc::_multi_mesh ( sMaterialHeader *  p_mat,
sMaterialPassHeader *  p_base_pass,
bool  bl,
bool  tx,
bool  cull 
)
static

См. определение в файле p_gx.cpp строка 4565

4566 {
4567  uint32 layer;
4568 
4569  multi_start( bl, tx );
4570 
4571  sMaterialPassHeader * p_pass = p_base_pass;
4572 
4573 // int uv_set = 0;
4574 
4575  int passes = p_mat->m_passes;
4576  if ( g_mat_passes < passes )
4577  {
4578  if ( g_mat_passes > 0 )
4579  {
4580  passes = g_mat_passes;
4581  }
4582  }
4583 
4584  for ( layer = 0; layer < (uint)passes; layer++, p_pass++ )
4585  {
4586  bool ignore_alpha = ( p_pass->m_flags & (1<<7) ) ? true : false;
4587 
4588  GXTexWrapMode u_mode;
4589  GXTexWrapMode v_mode;
4590 
4591  u_mode = p_pass->m_flags & (1<<5) ? GX_CLAMP : GX_REPEAT;
4592  v_mode = p_pass->m_flags & (1<<6) ? GX_CLAMP : GX_REPEAT;
4593 
4594  if ( p_pass->m_texture.p_data )
4595  {
4596  multi_add_texture ( p_pass->m_texture.p_data,
4597  p_pass->m_color,
4598  u_mode,
4599  v_mode,
4600  (BlendModes)p_pass->m_blend_mode,
4601  p_pass->m_alpha_fix,
4602  (float)(p_pass->m_k) * (1.0f / (float)(1<<8)),
4603  0.0f, //p_mat->m_shininess,
4604  p_pass->m_flags,
4605  layer,
4606  ignore_alpha,
4607  bl,
4608  tx );
4609  }
4610  else
4611  {
4612  // Untextured.
4613  GXTevStageID s_id = (GXTevStageID)(((int)GX_TEVSTAGE0)+stage_id);
4614  BlendModes blend = (BlendModes)p_pass->m_blend_mode;
4615  uint8 fix = p_pass->m_alpha_fix;
4616 
4617 
4618  GXColor col;
4619  if ( blend == vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN_FIXED )
4620  {
4621  col.r = fix;
4622  col.g = fix;
4623  col.b = fix;
4624  col.a = fix;
4625  }
4626  else
4627  {
4628  col.r = p_pass->m_color.r;
4629  col.g = p_pass->m_color.g;
4630  col.b = p_pass->m_color.b;
4631  col.a = fix;
4632  }
4633  if(tx && _su) GX::SetTevKColor( (GXTevKColorID)(((int)GX_KCOLOR0)+tev_id),
4634  col );
4635 
4636  if(bl && _su)
4637  {
4638  csel[(int)s_id] = (GXTevKColorSel)(((int)GX_TEV_KCSEL_K0)+layer_id);
4639  asel[(int)s_id] = (GXTevKAlphaSel)(((int)GX_TEV_KASEL_K0_A)+layer_id);
4640  sel[(int)s_id] = true;
4641  }
4642 
4643  if(bl && _su)
4644  {
4645  ordt[(int)s_id] = GX_TEXCOORD0;
4646  ordm[(int)s_id] = GX_TEX_DISABLE;
4647  ordc[(int)s_id] = GX_COLOR0A0;
4648  ord[(int)s_id] = true;
4649  }
4650 
4651  switch ( blend )
4652  {
4653  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN_FIXED:
4654  {
4655  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_KONST, GX_CA_RASA, GX_CA_ZERO,
4656  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+tev_id),
4657  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
4658  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_KONST, GX_CC_RASA, GX_CC_ZERO,
4659  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+tev_id) );
4660  stage_id++;
4661  }
4662  break;
4663  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN:
4664  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO,
4665  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ADDHALF, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+tev_id),
4666  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
4667  if ( ignore_alpha )
4668  {
4669  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_ZERO,
4670  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+tev_id) );
4671  }
4672  else
4673  {
4674  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_RASA, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_ZERO,
4675  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+tev_id) );
4676  }
4677 
4678  stage_id++;
4679  break;
4680  case vBLEND_MODE_ADD_FIXED:
4681  case vBLEND_MODE_SUB_FIXED:
4682  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_FIXED:
4683  case vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_FIXED:
4684  {
4685  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_KONST, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO,
4686  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_1, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+tev_id),
4687  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
4688  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_RASC, GX_CC_KONST, GX_CC_ZERO,
4689  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+tev_id) );
4690  stage_id++;
4691  }
4692  break;
4693  case vBLEND_MODE_ADD:
4694  case vBLEND_MODE_SUBTRACT:
4695  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND:
4696  case vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE:
4697  case vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE:
4698  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_PREVIOUS_MASK:
4699  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_INVERSE_PREVIOUS_MASK:
4700  default:
4701  if ( ignore_alpha )
4702  {
4703  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO,
4704  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ADDHALF, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+tev_id),
4705  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
4706  }
4707  else
4708  {
4709  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevAlphaInOpSwap( s_id, GX_CA_RASA, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO, GX_CA_ZERO,
4710  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+tev_id),
4711  GX_TEV_SWAP0, GX_TEV_SWAP0 );
4712  }
4713 
4714  if(bl && _su) GX::SetTevColorInOp( s_id, GX_CC_ZERO, GX_CC_RASC, GX_CC_KONST, GX_CC_ZERO,
4715  GX_TEV_ADD, GX_TB_ZERO, GX_CS_SCALE_2, GX_ENABLE, (GXTevRegID)(((int)GX_TEVPREV)+tev_id) );
4716  stage_id++;
4717  break;
4718  }
4719 
4720  if ( tev_id > 0 ) {
4721  multi_add_layer ( blend, fix, bl, tx );
4722  } else {
4723  // Set blend mode for base layer.
4724  switch ( blend )
4725  {
4726  case vBLEND_MODE_ADD:
4727  case vBLEND_MODE_ADD_FIXED:
4728  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode ( GX_BM_BLEND, GX_BL_SRCALPHA, GX_BL_ONE, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4729  break;
4730  case vBLEND_MODE_SUBTRACT:
4731  case vBLEND_MODE_SUB_FIXED:
4732  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode ( GX_BM_SUBTRACT, GX_BL_ZERO, GX_BL_ZERO, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4733  break;
4734  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND:
4735  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_FIXED:
4736  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode ( GX_BM_BLEND, GX_BL_SRCALPHA, GX_BL_INVSRCALPHA, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4737  break;
4738  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN:
4739  case vBLEND_MODE_BRIGHTEN_FIXED:
4740  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode ( GX_BM_BLEND, GX_BL_DSTCLR, GX_BL_ONE, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4741  break;
4742  case vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE_FIXED:
4743  case vBLEND_MODE_MODULATE:
4744  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode ( GX_BM_BLEND, GX_BL_ZERO, GX_BL_SRCALPHA, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4745  break;
4746  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_PREVIOUS_MASK:
4747  case vBLEND_MODE_BLEND_INVERSE_PREVIOUS_MASK:
4748  case vBLEND_MODE_DIFFUSE:
4749  default:
4750  if(bl && _su) GX::SetBlendMode ( GX_BM_NONE, GX_BL_ONE, GX_BL_ONE, GX_LO_CLEAR, GX_TRUE, GX_FALSE, GX_TRUE );
4751  break;
4752  }
4753  }
4754  tev_id++;
4755  layer_id++;
4756  }
4757  }
4758 
4759 #ifdef __PLAT_WN32__
4760  uint8 has_holes = p_base_pass->m_texture.p_data ? ( ( p_base_pass->m_texture.p_data->m_PaletteFormat >> 1 ) & 1 ) : 0;
4761 #else
4762  uint8 has_holes = p_base_pass->m_texture.p_data ? ( ( p_base_pass->m_texture.p_data->flags & NxNgc::sTexture::TEXTURE_FLAG_HAS_HOLES ) ? 1 : 0 ) : 0;
4763 #endif
4764  multi_end( (BlendModes)p_base_pass->m_blend_mode, p_base_pass->m_flags, has_holes, p_mat->m_alpha_cutoff, p_mat->m_flags, bl, tx, cull );
4765 }
